remarks: Vector subtraction in terms of group division operation.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvm.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvm.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvm.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvm.6 $e |- N = ( /g ` G ) $.
nvm $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( A N B ) ) $.
